column5: Still looking for info about Poverty Lake. Any help greatly appreciated. Reply to [email protected]. THANKS

Talk to the owner Chad, he knows all his lakes and will answer any questions. You've fished lakes in the area and there all the same to be honest with you. Good quality fish and same old scenery and they all bite on the usual baits. I've used them as an outfitter for the last few years and no complaints.
